sentence: We are also working with our European allies to ensure Ukraine’s military has the equipment and resources to defend itself.” Cognressman Tim Ryan Senator Rob Portman, R-Ohio, supports the sanctions and called on the Biden Administration to do more.
author: Gerry Ricciutti
title: Local lawmakers in unison over Russia-Ukraine conflict

sentence: Now, congressional action is the only option and Congressman Tim Ryan has now opted to cosponsor the new legislation.

title: Rep. Ryan sponsors bill to restore Delphi pensions

sentence: More:For Delphi's former salaried workers, retirement has been a long fight for fair treatment In the House, cosponsors include Democratic Reps. Debbie Dingell of Dearborn and Tim Ryan and Marcy Kaptur of Ohio; and Republican Reps. Michael Turner, Bill Johnson and Warren Davidson of Ohio.
author: Todd Spangler
title: Delphi retirees' fix could cost $1 billion, Biden's support for measure unclear
